title: Lenin and responses to global capitalism

content.question: The views expressed in the passage best illustrate which of the following processes?

choices.label: The modification of the economic theories of Adam Smith and John Stuart Mill in European universities
The desire to retain preindustrial forms of economic production by many imperial governments
The formulation of alternative visions of society in response to the spread of global capitalism
The expansion of the middle classes in newly industrialized societies

content.answer: The formulation of alternative visions of society in response to the spread of global capitalism

topic.text: 5.8: Reactions to the Industrial Economy from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
